about_the_game:
Futa on Female, Netorare

Face it, you fall short in every way 🍆. Even your feet👣 can't redeem you...

Your wife needs to be dominated; she yearns for it. Yet, you simply can't fill the void; the necessity in her heart. Your marriage is hanging on by a thread and you're at your wits end.

This would all change on one fateful day, when, coming home from work, you notice an unfamiliar car in your driveway.

Now go sit quietly in the corner--you should be so lucky...

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay
  • Kinetic Visual Novel
  • H-Scenes
  • ~7K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters are over the age of 21 years old.

- Futanari
- Futanari on Female sex
- Netorare (NTR)
- Domination
- Consumption of Alcohol (Wine)
- Dirty language
